title: What is wrong with the ranked system
body:
This isn't a rage type post. But what the hell is wrong with the ranked system? I find it impossible to play a game not have some troll or afker. I am bronze, yes. But it still isn't fair to lose a game and lp because of it.  I put time into this game only to find out someone going to troll. Then I lose, get mad, a don't want to play your game anymore. In my opinion, riot should spend more time banning these people instead of toxic players, you can't control toxic people but you can control trollers. I try hard to win, get out of bronze, and hopefully climb. But how is that possible with people from the left and right are just plain down dumb. Without a team you can't win. This is a team game not a solo game. So please spend more time banning these people. 

Thank you

replies.body:
MMR reset, flex queue accidents, and matchmaking changes effectively deleted (serious) ranked and started a chain reaction of ongoing clownfestival.

Everyone who was plat V (0 LP) is now in bronze V for no real reason, is mad about it, and is trolling to A; show their displeasure and B; stay in bronze V.
Meanwhile the broken matchmaking and RNG of climbing ranked is giving us wonders like the diamond vayne that goes 0/3 by 5 minutes in a silver/gold game (normals, luckily).

And that which is bronze V is still unfortunately bronze V, just mixed in with everyone else more or less randomly.
